name: tm32
effect: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
